item.title: Moving to Hugo
item.description: Moving to Hugo After many years on Jekyll I think the time is right to move to Hugo. ??

item.title: Matching binary patterns
item.description: Matching binary patterns In Erlang, it is easy to construct binaries and bitstrings and matching binary patterns. I was running into Mitchell Perilstein’s excellent work on NTP with Erlang and I thought I am going to use this to explain how bitstrings and binaries work in Erlang. Two concepts: A bitstring is a sequence of zero or more bits, where the number of bits does not need to be divisible by 8.
